1.0.name: wordpress/sharebuttons-by-toseef
1.0.description:
Social Networks are very popular now a days and great source to get readers for your blog. SocialButtons Plugin helps your users to share blog posts directly from your blog to social network sites like facebook, twitter, linkedin etc. This version of SocialButtons plugin supports following social networks

  • Twitter
  • Facebook
  • Google Plus
  • Linkedin
  • Stumbleupon
  • Digg
  • reddit
  • Evernote

You can 1. Enable/disable any of the above social share buttons from admin panel 2. Enable/disable social share buttons for Category/Home and Post pages
